HastyTouch.Name: Hasty Touch
HastyTouch.Description: Increases quality and requires no CP.

TricksOfTheTrade.Name: Tricks of the Trade
TricksOfTheTrade.Description: Restores 20 CP. Can only be used when material status is "Good" or "Excellent".

WasteNot.Name: WasteNot
WasteNot.Description: Reduces loss of durability by 50% for the next four steps.

Veneration.Name: Veneration
Veneration.Description: Increases efficiency of Synthesis actions by 50% for the next four steps.

GreatStrides.Name: Great Strides
GreatStrides.Description: Increases the efficiency of next Touch action by 100%. Effect active for three steps.

Innovation.Name: Innovation
Innovation.Description: Increases efficiency of Touch actions by 50% for the next four steps.

FinalAppraisal.Name: Final Appraisal
FinalAppraisal.Description: The next action that would complete item synthesis will instead leave one progress point remaining.

WasteNot2.Name: Waste Not II
WasteNot2.Description: Reduces loss of durability by 50% for the next eight steps.

CollectableSynthesis.Name: Collectable Synthesis
CollectableSynthesis.Description: Use existing recipes to create collectables without increasing step count.

ByregotsBlessing.Name: Byregot's Blessing
ByregotsBlessing.Description: Increases quality. Inner Quiet effect ends upon use.

CarefulObservation.Name: Careful Observation
CarefulObservation.Description: Do nothing for one step, preserving the status of any actions presently in effect.

Manipulation.Name: Manipulation
Manipulation.Description: Restores 5 points of durability after each step for the next eight steps.

PrudentTouch.Name: Prudent Touch
PrudentTouch.Description: Increases quality at half the durability cost.

PrepatoryTouch.Name: Prepatory Touch
PrepatoryTouch.Description: Increases quality at a greater cost to durability.

Groundwork.Name: Groundwork
Groundwork.Description: Increases progress at greater cost to durability. Efficiency decreases by half when durability is below durability cost.

TrainedEye.Name: Trained Eye
TrainedEye.Description: Increases quality by 100%. Available only on the first step. Recipe level must be at least 10 levels below yours. Cannot be used with expert crafting recipes.

HeartAndSoul.Name: Heart and Soul
HeartAndSoul.Description: Allows the execution of Precise Touch, Intensive Synthesis, or Tricks of the Trade regardless of material condition. Effect ends if the aforementioned actions are executed when material condition is not "Good" or "Excellent".

PrudentSynthesis.Name: Prudent Synthesis
PrudentSynthesis.Description: Increases progress at half the durability cost.

TrainedFinesse.Name: Trained Finesse
TrainedFinesse.Description: Increases quality at no cost to durability.
